data.title: Obituary for Ida Jean (Matusicky) Janik
meta_keywords: funeral home in Middleburg Hts OH
data.meta_description: Ida Janik | Passed away on Aug 01, 2022 | Ida-Jean Janik (nee Matusicky) age 77;... Learn More
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Ida Jean (Matusicky)  Janik | A. Ripepi & Sons Funeral Home
data.text:
Ida-Jean Janik (nee Matusicky) age 77; loving mother of James “Jimmy” Janik (Debra), Sharon Hanes, Kimberly “Kim” Saylor (Bryon); treasured nannie/grandma of Heather, Collin, Joseph, Ashley and cherished great-grandmother of Roman and Elizabella; dear sister of Ann Tirabassi and the late Tom Matusicky. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to the family. Interment Private. The family will receive friends Friday, August 5, 2022, from 5-7 PM at the A. RIPEPI AND SONS FUNERAL HOME, 18149 BAGLEY RD., MIDDLEBURG HTS. (WEST OF I-71).

To send flowers to the family, please visit our floral store.
